title: Man shot in car in Westwood
content:
CINCINNATI (WKRC) - Part of Boudinot Avenue was closed Wednesday night after a shooting.
The road has since reopened. The victim told police he was driving north toward Montana when he heard shots and realized a bullet had hit him in the shoulder. Police found shell casings across a two and a half block stretch.
They speculated the 21-year-old man was shot from another car.
His wound was not considered life threatening.
